ARABIC: فَوَقَعَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So the Truth took place and what they did was shown to be false.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus the truth was upheld, and the falsehood that they practised was exposed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus was the truth established, and their doings proved in vain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus the Truth prevailed and their false art was banished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the truth was proved and their works were disproved.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus truth was confirmed, and all that they did was made of no effect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So the truth was established, and what they did became null.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So the truth came to pass, and false was proved what they were doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus was the Truth vindicated and that which they were doing was made vain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus the truth prevailed and what they had produced came to nothing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thus the truth prevailed, and that which they had brought vanished.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So the truth came out, and what they had wrought was reduced to naught.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus truth was confirmed, and all that they did was made of no effect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus truth was confirmed, and all that they did was made of no effect.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So, the truth prevailed and what they were doing was annulled;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So the truth came to pass, and what they were producing came to nothing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So the truth was established, and abolished was what they were doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:118] Thus did the truth come to pass, [thus was it] confirmed and made manifest; and that which they were doing, in the way of sorcery, was proved false.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus was the Truth vindicated) it became clear that Moses was right (and that which they were doing) of sorcery (was made vain) fizzled away.
